name: Toys are Mad
description:
Luke was about to go home after a hard day's work in the Toy Factory when suddenly the lights go off. What happened? The toys have gone mad!! Help him to escape and get home before the dinner gets too cold :)

This game was made as part of the last SpeccyJam where the goal was to make a game that looked and felt like a Spectrum Zx game. Enjoy!

Controls

-----------

Cursor Keys - Move

Space - Trigger, Use gun (when collected)
